DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; VIRUS IS CURED
DOC.TEXT: Under the front-page headline , " The Defeated Prophets " : " Ten athletes and one genius : Italy is in the finals . Baggianism , the only faith which unites Italians in the world , this time did not have to wait for the last minutes of the game to explode . . . . " Roberto Baggio won the game in five minutes . . . . In the soccer computer , Bulgaria was the one wild card , the virus that could have upset the whole system . But they found themselves confronting an Italian team even more unpredictable and crazy than they . . . . No one predicted the tortuous path of the Italians toward the finals. "
